loans.name: Moturiayo

texts.en:
Moturiayo is 40 years old. She is a fish vendor, selling stockfish, and she has been in this business for a long time. She is married and has four children.

Moturiayo hopes for a loan in the amount of N50,000 to purchase more stockfish to sell.

She says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more stockfish to sell

loans.name: Amavi

texts.fr: Amavi S. est une femme de 40 ans, marié et mère de 2 enfants. Elle est revendeuse de céréales à Kpalimé. Son activité consiste à aller dans les fermes et acheter des roduits auprèes des agriculteurs et de venir les revendre en ville. Elle exerce ce commerce depuis des années. Avec ce crédit, Amavi souhaite accroître la capacité de son activité.
texts.en:
Amavi S., 40 , is married and the mother of 2 children. She re-sells cereals in Kpalimé. Her business consists of going to the farms and buying the farmers' produce to re-sell in town. She has been in this business for years. With this loan, Amavi hopes to grow her business.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchasing cereals for re-sale

loans.name: Abdurahim

texts.ru:
Абдурахим Исмоилов добрый и многоуважаемый человек в своем кишлаке. Он уже 30 лет занимается животноводческой деятельностью. Дома у Абдурахима 7 голов крупнорогатого скота, которых он откармливает и перепродает.
Животноводство это не единственный источник дохода в его семье, так как Абдурахим параллельно занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур, а так же он мастер-плотник.
Абдурахим живет со своей женой Тутти Исмоиловой и детьми. У них 3 дочерей, которые вышли замуж и проживают в доме своих мужей, и два сына, которые живут с родителями, то есть с Абдурахимом и Тутти.
Старший сын Абдурахима сотрудник Аэропорта, а младший помогает отцу в откорме и продаже скота.
Абдурахим запрашивает сумму в размере 1000 сомони на 6 месяцев.
texts.en:
Abdurahim I. is a good man and well-respected in his village. He has practiced animal husbandry for the past 30 years. He has 7 head of cattle at home, for fattening and reselling. Animal husbandry is not his family's sole source of income, since Abdurahim also raises crops, as well as being a master carpenter. Abdurahim lives with his wife Tutti Ismoilova and their children. They have three daughters who have married and live in the house with their husbands, and two sons who live with their parents (Abdurahim and Tutti). Abdurahim's eldest son works at the airport and the younger helps his father feed and sell livestock. Abdurahim is requesting 1000 somoni for 6 months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Feeding livestock

loans.name: Rita

texts.en:
Rita H. is 58 years old. She lives happily with her seven children. She is a widow. Since her husband passed away, Rita has worked hard for her family by running a variety store, a business she started with her first loan cycle.

She is now applying for a third loan cycle. If granted, the loan will be used to procure additional items for sale in her variety store. She is expecting a much higher income from this investment.

Rita is looking forward to increased profits and a better standard of living for her family, thanks to the assistance rendered by this lending organization.

loans.use: To procure additional items for her variety store

location.town: Tumpagon, Cagayan de Oro, Misamis Oriental

loans.name: Parda

texts.ru: Алиев Парда , житель города Яван. Живет в одном из отдаленных мест города. Всю жизнь занимается сельским хозяйством. Иеет участок земли , который засеевает злаковые культуры. Кроме того частично сажает овощи . Планирует получить кредит для того, чтобы закупить минеральные удобрения и семена. Кроме как в сельском хозяйстве он работает сварщиком. Женат и имет восьмерых  детей. Единственными источниками дохода семьи являются эти два бизнеса.
texts.en:
Parda A. is a resident of the town of Yavan. He lives in one of the remote areas of the town. He has been in agriculture all his life. He has a plot of land which he sows with cereals. Besides that he also sows vegetables. He plans to use the loan to buy mineral fertilizer and seeds. He also works as a welder besides doing his agriculture business. He is married and has eight children. These two businesses are the only sources of income for his family.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Sallema Group

texts.en: Sallema is the group leader of Sallema group. There are four members in this group. Each of them wants to take a loan for her/his business. Sallema wants to take a loan for the business of embroidery. Norua wants to take a loan for the business of tailoring. S. Wasduin wants to take a loan for the business of a general store. Zalashta wants to take a loan for the business of a shop selling fruits and vegetables. They are requesting a group loan of 40000 Afghani . They are very happy from this loan process in Afghanistan.

loans.use: For expanding businesses

loans.name: Mais

texts.en:
Mais J. has always been a hard-working man who has made sure, from his young age, that his family never goes without their daily bread. He is married with 2 children.

Mais has a grocery store where he sells different kinds of foodstuffs. With a starting capital of 300 USD and thanks to his perseverance and dedication, Mais began this enterprise 5 years ago. Over time he expanded his business and today this business has become a family business with his whole family engaged in this business.

Today Mais needs to buy additional foodstuffs to increase the range of his goods. With this purpose in mind, he is requesting a loan of 1200 USD. He is ready to work even harder, make sacrifices and push every once in a while to achieve his goal and become a successful entrepreneur.

loans.use: To purchase more food products

loans.name: Marl Nesly

texts.en: Marl Nesly R. is 25 years old. She is happily married with 2 children. Her husband is a motorcycle driver in their village. They both worked hard for the education and other primary needs of their children. Marl has been involved in a variety store business for almost a year. She wants to expand it further to generate a much higher income, enough to support their family needs. She is now applying for her third cycle loan from HSPFI, a Kiva partner. She is looking forward to more improvements in her business from the assistance granted by the organization.

loans.use: To procure additional items for her variety store

location.town: Tumpagon, Cagayan de Oro, Misamis Oriental

loans.name: Sanela

texts.en: Sanela Tubić is 20 years old and lives in Miričina, together with her husband and child. Her husband has a consistent job and maintains the family. Sanela is a young mother and became a housewife not so long ago. She wants to lead her household as well as possible by planting vegetables in her garden and raising chickens. Sanela requested her first loan with MCF WWI in the amount of 700 KM to purchase poultry and food for the chickens. She hopes to produce chicken meat of good quality for her family and to sell some.

loans.use: To buy chickens and feed

loans.name: Mazakhir

texts.en:
Mazakhir A. is a married man and the father of four children. Together with his wife he has been raising cattle and sheep for more than 20 years. This produces the income which allows him to feed his children and his wife. As well as caring for his livestock, he also works as a head of the municipality of the village where he lives which helps with the family's diet and provides additional income.

Mazakhir has asked for this loan to buy one young cow and 15 sheep in order to obtain a better profit. His greatest wish is to be able to improve his farm by constructing enclosures and establishing better grazing for his cattle and sheep.

loans.use: To purchase one cow and 15 sheep

loans.name: Nemat

texts.en:
The agriculture business takes a great deal of effort, requiring as it does exposure to the sun, the physical exertion of moving animals from one place to another and the hard work of tending to various crops. Nemat Q. has dedicated himself to cattle-raising for 12 years now to support his humble family which so relies on him.

Currently Nemat is requesting a loan of 1200 USD to purchase two calves that he can raise. It’s important to note that the granting of this loan will not only benefit him, but also his two children and wife, the family he greatly loves.

loans.use: To purchase two calves

loans.name: Edgorali

texts.ru: Занджиров Едгорали житель города Яван.Возраст 38 лет, женат и имеет одного ребенка. Работает разнорабочим по найму. Кроме того занимается купле продажей мелко рогатого скота. Планирует получить кредит , чтобы закупить овец и коз. На полученные доходы планирует сделать ремонт в своем доме.
texts.en:
Edgorali Z. is a resident of the town of Yavan. He is 38 years old, married and has one child. He does odd jobs on demand. Besides this type of work he also buys and resells small cattle. He plans to use the loan to buy sheep and goats. He plans to use the profit to make repairs in his home.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy small cattle

loans.name: Bineta

texts.fr: PARENT BENEFICIAIRE DEPUIS PLUSIEURS ANNEES DANS LA ZONE DE CAMBERENE BINETA M. S'ACTIVE DANS LA PETITE RESTAURATION DEPUIS CINQ ANS.ELLE SOLLICITE CE PRET POUR DIVERSIFIER SON ACTIVITE.
texts.en:
A member for a number of years in the Camberene zone, Bineta M. has been working at selling cooked food on a small scale for 5 years. She is requesting this loan to diversify her business.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: selling cooked food

loans.name: Dominga

texts.en: Dominga M. is 69 years of age. She is married and happily living with her 8 children. Her husband manages their farm. They cultivate their land and plant it with corn, cassava, and bananas. They deliver their products to the downtown area. As of this moment, Dominga and her husband are in need of a loan to buy fertilizer for their corn. She is now applying for a loan from HSPFI, a Kiva partner. She will be blessed if her request is granted.

loans.use: To procure fertilizers for farming

location.town: Tumpagon, Cagayan de Oro, Misamis Oriental

loans.name: Safar

texts.ru: Имомов Сафар проживает в районе Яван. В возрасте 71 года. Женат, имеет 8 детей. Сафар 48 лет проработал по своей специальности, учителем. В свободнее от работы время, занимается животноводством. Этим видом бизнеса занимается более 3 лет. Клиент хочет получить у нас кредит, чтобы купить теленка, откормить а потом продать. А на полученный доход до конца отремонтировать свой дом.
texts.en:
Safar I. lives in the Yavan region. He is 71 years old. He is married and has eight children. Safar has worked as a teacher, in his profession, for 48 years. In his free time from work he has been doing animal husbandry. He has been in this business for more than three years. The client wants to take out a loan from us to buy a calf, feed it and then resell it. Then he wants to use the profit to finish the repairs in his home.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a calf

loans.name: Zanab

texts.en:
Zanab is 50 years old and is married with four children. She cooks and sells beef to earn a living. She is hoping to obtain a loan in the amount of N100,000 in order to purchase more beef to cook and sell.

She says thanks to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more beef to cook and sell

loans.name: Dorin

texts.en:
Dorin T. runs a business growing domestic vegetables. This is the primary source of his family's income. Dorin has been farming vegetables for more than 12 years. He grows tomatoes, cucumbers, peppers, and eggplants. He owns two greenhouses, with a growth surface of 776 square meters.

Business is profitable, and Dorin is focused on reducing his costs of production to increase profits. He requested a loan from Microinvest to purchase transparent film so he can finish construction of two additional greenhouses. He is grateful to Microinvest for the trust and financial support the organization has granted him.

He is the father of three children who are the source of his inspiration and his impulse to strive for the better.

loans.use: To purchase transparent film for the construction of greenhouses

loans.name: Oulimata

texts.fr: OULIMATA N. EST PARENT BENEFICIAIRE EXERCANT L'ACTIVITE DE COUTURIERE ET NE DISPOSANT QU'UNE SEULE MACHINE.VOULANT AMELIORER SON ACTIVITE ELLE DESIRE ACQUERIR UNE SECONDE MACHINE AFIN DE SATISFAIRE SA CLIENTELE.
texts.en:
Oulimata N. is a member who works as a seamstress but has only one single sewing machine. Wishing to improve her business, she wants to acquire a second sewing machine so as to satisfy her clientele.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: acquiring another sewing machine

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace earns her living by selling bottled water and other beverages. She has been in this business for a long time. She hopes to be granted a loan in the amount of N150,000 in order to purchase more bottled water and drinks to sell.

She is 63 years old and is married with three children.

She says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more bottled water and beverages to sell

loans.name: Sherali

texts.ru: Шерали Колтаев проживает в районе Яван. Возраст 33 года. Женат, имеет 2 детей. Шерали вместе с братом занимается земледелием. Этим видом деятельности более 4 лет. Помимо этого, он работает таксистом. Клиент хочет взять у нас кредит, чтобы закупить удобрения. В дальнейшем собрать хороший урожай лука и других овощей.
texts.en:
Sherali K. resides in Yavan. He is 33 years old and is married with 2 children. For the past 4 years Sherali and his brother have worked in agriculture. Besides, Sherali earns extra cash as a cab driver. He would like to use the loan for the purchase of fertilizers so that he gets a good harvest of onions and other vegetables.

Translated from Russian by Oksana Buranbaeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers

loans.name: Chiwendu

texts.en:
Chiwendu sells jewelry, shoes, and bags. Her dream is to own her own boutique someday. She hopes to be granted a loan in the amount of N150,000, which she plans to use to purchase more jewelry, shoes, and bags to sell.

Chiwendu is 24 years old and single with no children.

She says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more jewelry, shoes, and bags to sell

loans.name: Parda

texts.ru: Одинаев Парда в возрасте 37 лет, живет в районе Яван. Женат, имеет 1 сына. Парда более 5 лет занимается земледелием. Его сын помогает ему по земледелию. Клиент хочет взяь у нас кредит, чтобы купить минерали и посеить сельхозяйственную продукцию.
texts.en:
Parda Odinaev lives in Yavan. He is 37 years old and is married with one son. For the past 5 years he has been an agricultural worker. His son helps him around. Parda would like to use the loan for the purchase of fertilizers and planting produce.

Translated from Russian by Oksana Buranbaeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: fertilizers

loans.name: Gameli

texts.fr: Gameli D. est un homme de 37 ans, marié et père de 2 enfants. il est conducteur de taxi à Kpalimé, une ville situé à environ 120 kilomètres de Lomé, la capitale togolaise. les dépenses engendrées par les réparations de sa voiture ne lui permettent pas d’épargner et de subvenir aux besoins de la famille. Avec ce crédit, Gameli souhaite acheter renouveler son moteur afin de mieux exercer son activité et de subvenir aux besoins de la famille.
texts.en:
Gameli D., 37, is married and the father of 2 children. He is a taxi driver in Kpalimé, a town situated about 120 km from Lomé, the Togolese capital. The outlay of money to repair his car doesn't allow him to save anything nor support his family appropriately. With this loan, Gameli wishes to upgrade his car's motor so that he can go about his work and better cater for the needs of his family.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: upgrading his car's motor

loans.name: Ilinka

texts.en:
Ilinka was born in 1952. She comes from Karanovac, Petrovo, where she lives with her husband.

Ilinka and her husband, who is retired from his career, are very busy with farming, keeping pigs, and maintaining a nursery. They have two or three pigs, and these provide piglets every year, which Ilinka and her husband raise and sell. In addition, every season, Ilinka and her husband sell the vegetables they grow in their nursery. They have loyal customers for all the products they produce.

Ilinka has requested her first loan from MCF WWI in the amount of 1,500 KM, which she wishes to use to purchase more pigs. She hopes to find pigs at a low price so that she can buy more of them. The couple hopes to increase their income in this way, since they receive only a small amount from Ilinka's husband's pension.

loans.use: To buy pigs

loans.name: Abdulfatoh

texts.ru: Абдулфатох Сатторов проживает в районе Яван. Возраст 37 лет. Женат, имеет 3 детей. Сатторов занимается животноводством, более 3-х лет. Его старший сын тоже помогает отцу. Этот вид бизнеса является основным источником дохода. Клиент просит у нас кредит, чтобы купить бычка, для продажи после откармливания.
texts.en:
Abdulfatoh S. lives in Yavan. He is 37 years old and is married with 3 children. For over three years Abdulfatoh has been doing cattle farming. His elder son helps him around. Cattle farming has been the family's main source of income. Abdulfatoh is applying for a loan in order to buy a bull calf which he would raise and sell at a profit.

Translated from Russian by Oksana Buranbaeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: bull calf

loans.name: Maguette

texts.fr: MAGUETTE D. EST PARENT BENEFICIAIRE DANS LA ZONE DE CAMBERENE DEPUIS LONGTEMPS ET OPERE DANS LE DOMAINE DE LA FRIPPERIE.ELLE DESIRE AUGMENTER SON FOND DE ROULEMENT POUR MIEUX DEVELOPPER SON ACTIVITE.
texts.en:
Maguette D. has been a member in the Camberene zone for a long time and sells used clothing. She would like to add to her working capital so as to be able to develop her business better.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: adding to her working capital

loans.name: Ami

texts.fr: Ami K. est une femme de 39 ans, mariée et mère de 2 enfants. elle est revendeuse de pagnes à Kpalimé.  Elle souhaite avec ce crédit augmenter la capacité de son commerce en louant un agasin et l’approvisionner. Elle compte sur cette chance pour mieux gagner sa vie.
texts.en:
Ami K. is a woman of 39, married and the mother of 2 children. She sells "pagnes" (lengths of brightly colored African print cloth) in Kpalimé. She wants to use this loan to grow her business by renting a shop and stocking it. She is counting on this chance to earn her living better.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchasing "pagnes" for re-sale

loans.name: Abduggafor

texts.ru: Туйсанов Абдуггафор проживает в районе Яван. Возраст 21 год. Не женат, детей не имеет. Абдуггафор со своим братом и отцом занимаются животноводством. Этим видом деятельности они занимаются более 5 лет. Семью они поддерживают за счет животноводства. Клиент хочет получить у нас кредит, чтобы купить бычка, откормить и перепродать.
texts.en:
Abduggafor T. resides in Yavan. He is 21 years old and is single. He has no children. Abduggafor, his fafther and brother breed cattle. They have been doing it for over five years, and cattle breeding is their primary income soutce. Abduggafor would like to get a loan for the purchase of a bull calf that they plan to resell later.

Translated from Russian by Oksana Buranbaeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to purchase a bull calf

loans.name: Victor

texts.en:
Victor has been away from the farm for a number of years and he would like to get back into a cattle operation. He has inherited the family farm and has decided to invest some of his hard-earned dollars into farming and ranching property and would subsequently like to start running a few cows. Victor wanted to share a few thoughts on how he might go about starting from scratch. Victor has been a rancher all his life so Microinvest trusts him and wants to help him undertake this endeavor. He is honest with himself.

Victor wants to increase his ranch equipment to diversify his income, but only own as much equipment as is necessary. He might get into livestock hauling, brush removal, firewood sales, fence building and hunting guides. Microinvest granted him a loan of 30,000 lei to purchase all the necessities.

loans.use: To purchase cattle

loans.name: Komla

texts.fr: Komla K. est un jeune homme de 28 ans, célibataire sans enfants. il est menuisier à Kpalimé. Depuis 4 ans, Komla exerce cette activité et il est compté parmi les meilleurs de la ville. Il souhaite avec ce crédit acheter des planches et des outils de travail pour l’exécution de ses œuvres
texts.en:
Komla K. is a young man, 28 years old, unmarried, and without children. For four years, he has been in this business, and he is counted among the best in town. He would like to use this loan to buy planks and work tools for performing his work.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy planks and work tools to carry out his work

loans.name: Kokou

texts.fr: Kokou G. est un jeune homme de 35 ans, marié et père d’un enfant. il est un vaillant garçon. Propriétaire d’une boutique d’alimentation générale à Kpalimé, Kokou fait de son entreprise l’une des plus renommée de la ville. Il est très ambitieux et désire avec ce crédit accroître la taille de son commerce en approvisionnant son magasin de nouveaux produits afin de mieux satisfaire les besoins de la clientèle.
texts.en:
Kokou G. is a young man, 35 years old, married, and a father with a child. He is a valiant boy. The owner of a general store in Kpalimé, he has made his enterprise one of the most renowned in town. He is very ambitious and would like to use this loan to expand his business by stocking his store with new merchandise in order to satisfy his customers better.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To supply his store with new products

loans.name: Tatiana

texts.en:
Tatiana has been in the garment business for many years. Having a rich experience in the business, she decided to launch her own a tailoring shop two years ago.

As a seamstress who has set up shop in Chisinau City, she is hoping to provide a variety of services to local clients. She employed tailors who actively participate in increasing the business despite nationwide competition. They can offer alterations on prom dresses, bridesmaid dresses, pants, jeans and mess kits. Tatiana enjoys the customers and she really enjoys meeting people and helping them to get what they need to have done.

Tatiana did extensive research before starting up her tailoring shop. She began producing better grades of garments with fine material and a highly qualified workman team. A good quality sewing machine will be her biggest start-up expense. She decided to borrow a loan of 30,000 lei from Microinvest to buy a new sewing machine for new workers where each of them is interested in business expansion.

loans.use: To purchase a new sewing machine

loans.name: Fambaye

texts.fr: FAMBAYE D. EST PARENT BENEFICIAIRE DEPUIS PLUSIEURS ANNEES.ELLE  A PLUS DE CINQ ANS D'EXPERIENCE DANS LE PETIT COMMERCE.SON OBJECTIF EST DE DIVERSIFIER SON COMMERCE AFIN DE SATISFAIRE SA CLIENTELE.
texts.en:
Fambaye D. has been a recipient parent for several years. She has over five years of experience in small-scale commerce. Her objective is to diversify her business in order to satisfy her customers.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: COMMERCE

loans.name: Komla

texts.fr: Komla T. est conducteur de taxi moto à Kpalime, une ville située à environ 120 kilomètres de Lomé, la capitale. Il est dévoué dans cette activité. Komla exerce cette fonction depuis trois ans mais la moto qu’il conduit ne l’appartenait pas. Avec ce crédit, KOmla désire acquérir sa propre moto afin de mieux gagner sa vie.
texts.en:
Komla T. is a moto taxi drive in Kpalime, a city located about 120 km from Lomé, the capital. He is dedicated in this work. He has been working in this capacity for three years, but the moto he’s driving didn’t belong to him. With this loan, Komla would like to acquire his own moto in order to earn a better living.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a motorbike

loans.name: Loveth

texts.en: Loveth is 30 years old and she is married with two children. She sells baby clothes, cream, flask, etc. She hopes for the loan of N30,000 to purchase more baby clothes and cream to sell. She says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more baby clothes and cream to sell

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en: Ruth is thirty-six years old and married with six children. She sells provisions to her customers at her retail grocery store.  She wants a loan to purchase more provisions to sell. She sends her thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To buy more provisions to sell

loans.name: Joana

texts.en: Joana Y. is a trader, selling food supplies, sandals, slippers and shoes at Elmina. Joana was educated through junior high.  Her husband is a fisherman and they have four children.  Joana has been running her food market business since 2002.  She is responsible for providing some of the basic needs of the family and sometimes also for paying school fees. Her loan will be used to buy more groceries to sell. She hopes to use the profits from her business to build a house.

loans.use: To buy food supplies to sell.

loans.name: Joy

texts.en: Joy is thirty-four years old and married with four children. She sells baskets of tomatoes both wholesale and retail to her customers. She is asking for a loan to purchase more baskets of tomatoes to sell. She offers her thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To buy more tomatoes to sell.

loans.name: Lucky

texts.en: Lucky is forty-five years old and married with four children. He is a farmer and he also sells yams. He is requesting a  loan to purchase more yams to sell. He says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To buy more yams to sell

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en: Cecilia A. is married and has three children. She was educated through primary school. Cecilia sells vegetables, canned tomatoes, beans and other food supplies at Ola in Cape Coast, which she has done since 2000. Her husband is a messenger. Cecilia uses her income to provide for the children. She will use the loan to purchase more food supplies to sell. Cecilia will reinvest her new profits back into the business.

loans.use: To buy food supplies to sell.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is 50 years old and she is married with eight children. She sells fresh tomatoes. She hopes for a loan of 70,000 nairas to purchase more fresh tomatoes to sell. She says thank to all Kiva lenders!

loans.use: To purchase fresh tomatoes

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en: Jennifer O., 30 years old and married with 2 children, has a beauty salon where she makes hair for her customers. She hopes for the loan amount of N70,000 to purchase more hair cream and hair extensions to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders

loans.use: To purchase more hair cream and hair extensions to sell.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary E., married with four children, was educated through Junior High School and has sold groundnuts, yams, beans, pure water and other food supplies at Ola in Cape Coast for the past five years. Her husband is a fisherman. Mary uses her income to take care of her children and is requesting a loan to purchase more food supplies for selling.  Mary plans to put the new profits from her expanded business into her savings account.

loans.use: To purchase more food supplies to sell.

loans.name: Tathekeh Group

texts.en:
This is Jane K., Ashatu S., Wuya B. and Marie K.. Jane (on the left) is the leader of the group. She is 45 years old and married with six children. She was born in Makeni, in northern Sierra Leone, and she has been a businesswoman for over 20 years now. Jane sells local produce like rice and palm oil (the most popular cooking oil). Sometimes, she also travels to neighboring Guinea to buy goods like slippers, clothes and rubber bowls.

This group is named Tathekeh. This is not the first loan this group has received from Kiva through SMT. Previous loans have had a tremendous impact on the lives of these entrepreneurs. With the help of previous loans, they were able to improve their businesses, make better profit and consequently improve their living standards. Having repaid their last loan successfully, they are requesting a new loan of 4,000,000 leones in order to further strengthen their businesses.

loans.use: To buy more goods

loans.name: Marie

texts.fr: marie F. est une jeune femme née en 1969 à thies ;elle est célibataire et habite chez ses parents au quartier diakhao;elle est enseignante de profession mais souffre d'une maladie des articulations qui nécessite des soins intensifs ;c'est donc pour se faire soigner qu'elle a ouvert un compte et a demandé ce pret.
texts.en:
Marie F. is a young woman who was born in 1969 in Thies. She is unmarried and lives at her parent’s place in the Diakhao district. She is a teacher by profession but suffers from an illness of the joints that requires intensive treatment. So, to care for herself, she opened an account and asked for a loan.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Medical expenses

loans.name: Adamu Group

texts.en:
This is Adama B., Fatu T. and Mariatu K., who belong to the Adamu group, named after their group leader. This will be the fourth loan the group is requesting from SMT/Kiva, the previous ones, all since repaid, having had a huge impact on their lives. This group is now requesting a new loan to further strengthen their businesses.

Adama (pictured on the right) is the leader of this group. Married with four children, 40-year-old Adama was born in Makeni, in northern Sierra Leone and has been a businesswoman selling dried fish for many years. With this loan, she will be able to buy about two baskets full of dried fish. At Tongbo village (about 170 miles from Makeni), where she normally makes her purchases, a dozen fish cost her about Le 60,000 – Le 70,000.00.

loans.use: To invest in her business.

loans.name: Omar

texts.fr: OMAR L. EST UN TAILLEUR BIEN CONNU DANS LE QUARTIER DE YOFF.SON EXPERIENCE DANS LE METIER FAIT QUE SACLIENTELE S'ACCROIT DE JOUR EN JOUR.PAR CONSEQUENT LE CREDIT QUI LUI EST ACCORDE LUI PERMETTRA D'INVESTIR POUR AFIN DE MIEUX REPONDRE AUX EXIGENCE DE SA CLIENTELE.
texts.en:
Omar L. is a well-known tailor in the Yoff district. His experience in this trade has resulted in his customers growing in number day after day. Consequently, the loan granted to him will enable him to invest, so as to respond to the demands of his customers.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Investment

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en: Vivian is 44 years old and she is married with eight children. She sells provisions like toothpaste, tomato paste, etc. She is requesting a loan amount of 100,000 nairas to purchase more provisions to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders!

loans.use: To purchase more provisions

loans.name: Abiba

texts.en: Abiba is 40 years old and she is married with four children. She sells tubers of yam in Aduwawa market in Edo state, Nigeria. She hopes for a loan of 100,000 nairas to purchase more tubers of yam to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more tubers of yam

loans.name: Awa

texts.fr: madame awa A. est femme mariee née en 1951 à louga;elle est enseignante de profession et fait également du petit commerce;elle achète des chaussures chez les cordonnires de la ville de thies pour ensuite les revendre au détail à ses collègues et voisins qui sont ses principaux clients;c'est dans le but d'augmenter son chiffre d'affaire qu'elle sollicite ce pret.
texts.en:
Ms. Awa A. is a married woman who was born in 1951 in Louga. She is a teacher by profession, and she also has a small business. She buys shoes from shoemakers in the city of Thies for retail sale to colleagues and neighbors who are her main customers. With the goal of increasing her turnover, she’s requesting this loan.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Commerce in shoes

loans.name: Maporta Group

texts.en:
This is Sallay K., Ya Yeabu S., Ibrahim C. T. and Joseph T.. Sallay (on the left) is the leader of this group. Sallay was born in Maporta, one of several villages surrounding Magburaka town. She is now 40, her husband is already retired, and they have six children. Her children are all in secondary school. Sallay has been a businesswoman for many years and she sells groundnuts (peanuts). She will use this loan to buy about four bags of groundnuts. The price for a bag of groundnut varies from season to season and from one location to another. Currently, a bag of groundnuts costs her Le 200,000 SLL in Luma villages, which rotate as business centers.

This group is named Maporta, after the group leader’s home village. They have been receiving loans from Kiva lenders through SMT. Previous loans have had a huge impact on the lives of these entrepreneurs. Their businesses grew and they can feed, clothe and send their children to school. Having repaid their previous loan successfully, they feel the need to request a new loan in order to keep strengthening their businesses.

loans.use: To buy groundnuts

loans.name: Ehizogie

texts.en: Ehizogie is 28 years old and she is single without a child. She sells computer accessories. She hopes for a loan of 140,000 nairas to purchase more computer accessories to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more computer accessories to sell

loans.name: Patient Group

texts.en:
This is Abdul T. and Mohamed Conteh. They are local entrepreneurs in Magburaka, a city in northern Sierra Leone. With the help of previous Kiva loans, these entrepreneurs keep maintaining steady and booming businesses.  They have repaid their last Kiva loan successfully. They are now requesting a new loan of Le 1,200,000 for each of them to further strengthen their businesses. 

Abdul T. (right) is the leader of this group. Abdul was born in the village of Masinra, which is about twenty-eight miles from Magburaka, in northern Sierra Leone. Abdul is married to a businesswoman. He sells creams, toothpastes, bars of soap, torch lights (flashlights), sprays and so on. He has been a businessman for over ten years.

loans.use: Invest in his business

loans.name: Judith

texts.en: Judith is 42 years old and married with five children. She sells sarongs and laces in Uselu market in Benin City, Edo State, Nigeria. She hopes for a loan of N70,000 to purchase more sarongs and laces to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders

loans.use: Purchase sarongs and laces to resell

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Femmes Commercantes 10 Group

texts.fr: aminata,isseu,yarame,khady et ndeye arame sont toutes des femmes qui font du commerce au marché grand thies;elles vendent en général des denrées alimentaires,des légumes et des poissons au détail;elles ont décidé de se regrouper sous forme de groupe de solidarité et ont ouvert un compte au sein de la mutuelle;elles ont fait cette demande de pret pour augmenter leur fonds de roulement.
texts.en:
Aminata, Isseu, Yarame, Khady, and Adeye Arame are all women who work in commerce at the Grand Thies marketplace. She generally sells food items, vegetables, and fish at the retail level. The women decided to form a solidarity group and open an account with the mutuelle. They made this loan request to increase their working capital.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Retail business

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en: Anthony is 45 years old and married with five children. He sells spare motor parts, and hopes for a loan of N120, 000 to purchase more parts to resell. He says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: Purchase motor parts to resell

loans.name: Helena

texts.en:
Helena H. is married with three children. Her husband is a pastor, and Helena is responsible for paying bills and taking care of the children. 

Helena completed senior high school, and has been selling food for the past eight years. She sells cooked rice, banku (cooked fermented dough), red red (a popular stew), and groceries at Ola in Cape Coast. She is requesting a loan to purchase more food stuffs and rice for her chop bar. She hopes to use any new profits to expand her business.

loans.use: Purchase more food stuffs and rice for the chop bar

loans.name: Sunday

texts.en: Sunday is 38 years old and married with no children. He sells groceries. He hopes for a loan of 80,000 NGN to purchase more grocery items to sell. He says thank you to all Kiva lenders

loans.use: Purchase more grocery items to sell

loans.name: Abel

texts.en: Abel is 28 years old and is single without a child. He sells furniture fabrics. He hopes for the loan of N80,000 to purchase more furniture fabric to sell. He says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more furniture fabric to sell

loans.name: Carmela

texts.es: CarmeL. tiene 37 años, vive con sus hijos en su casa propia. DesD. niña se ha dedicado a las tareas del campo, ya que proviene D. una familia D. agricultores, y como aun vive en su pueblo natal, L. herencia D. sus padres, sus tierras, es lo que tiene para generarse los ingresos económicos para sostener a su familia. Cada día se levanta muy temprano para cuidar D. sus animales, lo cuales venderá en L. feria ganadera D. su localidad, aprovechando a su vez, para L. venta D. guano. Cuando llega L. época D. cosecha, venD. directamente sus productos en el mercado y D. esa manera se generara mayores ganancias, sus hijos varones L. ayudan en las tareas más duras como las D. cargar los sacos para transportarlos. Para más adelante, CarmeL. quiere incrementar L. cantidad D. ovejas y toretes que tiene, ya que con estos, pueD. producir más guano para vender. Este es su préstamo número 14 con MFP, elL. es una D. las integrantes más antiguas D. su banco comunal, y L. que siempre promueve L. unidad, es por ello que renueva el compromiso D. seguir adelante por el bienestar común D. su grupo. El dinero que CarmeL. está solicitando es para L. compra D. ovejas, y D. esa manera, aumentar L. cantidad D. animales que tiene.
texts.en:
CarmeL. is 37 years old and lives with her children in her own house. She comes from a family of farmers and has worked the land since she was a child. She still lives in the town where she was born and has the land she inherited from her parents. She uses it to earn an income and support her family. She gets up early every day to take care of her animals, which she will sell, along with manure, at livestock markets in the area. At harvest time, she sells her products by direct sale in the market, thereby earning more profit. Her male children help her with the harder tasks like lifting and moving sacks. In the future, CarmeL. wants to have more sheep and young bulls so they produce more manure to sell. This is her 14th loan with MFP. She is one of the longest standing members of her communal bank, and the one that always works towards collaboration. That is why she is renewing her commitment to continue for the well being of her group. CarmeL. requests money to purchase sheep so she can have more animals.

Translated from Spanish by Kelly Wester, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase more sheep

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena tiene 44 años, vive con su esposo y sus hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace 20 años, junto a su esposo, se dedica a las tareas de la agricultura, sembrando los productos oriundos de su zona como la papa y la oca, y paralelamente cría animales. Trabaja arduamente para que luego de varios meses pueda obtener el fruto de su trabajo, la recompensa de su ardua labor, por ello se levanta muy temprano para dejar la comida lista y preparar a sus hijos para que vayan a la escuela. Cada día sale a pastear a sus animales, camino a sus lejanas tierras de cultivo donde revisa que sus plantaciones estén bien y regresa para guardar a sus animales en su establo. Después de varios meses de esta recargada rutina, Elena y su esposo irán a vender sus productos cosechados y sus animales engordados, con cuyas ganancias pueden sostener las necesidades de la familia. Este trabajo, por muchos años, ha sido el único sostén de su hogar, y para Elena esta labor seguirá siendo el motor económico de su casa. Este es su doceavo préstamo con MFP, ella es una de las integrantes más antiguas de su banco comunal y se siente contenta de haber permanecido tanto tiempo, siendo reconocida por ser responsable y colaboradora. El dinero que Elena está solicitando será invertido en la compra de sacos de abono y fertilizante para su próxima siembra.
texts.en:
Elena is 44 years old and lives with her husband and children in a house they own. Elena and her husband have worked in agriculture for 20 years, planting the native products of their area like potatoes and oca. They also raise animals. She works hard, so that after several months she can obtain the fruits of her labor. Therefore, she gets up very early to prepare the food and to get her children ready for school. Everyday she feeds her animals and then goes to her plots of land, that are far away, where she looks over her plants to see how they are doing. She then returns to the stable to check on her animals. After several months of this busy routine, Elena and her husband sell what they have harvested and the animals they have fattened. They use what they earn to maintain their family. For many years this work has been the only source of income for the family. And for Elena, this work will continue to be the main source of income for the family. This is her twelfth loan with MFP. She is one of the oldest members of her communal bank and is happy to have been with them for so long being seen as responsible and easy to work with. The money Elena is requesting will be invested in the purchase of sacks of fertilizer for her next planting.

Translated from Spanish by Shelly Hubman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Compra de abono y fertilizantes

loans.name: Jonathan

texts.en: Jonathan is 40 years old and married with two children. He is a commercial bus driver and he is also a mechanic. He sells motor spare parts. He hopes for the loan amount of N80,000 to purchase more motor spare parts to sell. He says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more motor spare parts to sell

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en: Rosemary is 30 years old and she is married with two children. She has a store where she sells provisions. She hopes for the loan of N80,000 to purchase more provisions to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more provisions to sell

loans.name: Rosina

texts.en:
Rosina O. is married and has three children. Her husband is a teacher. She has received schooling through tertiary level.

Rosina sells detergents, smocks (a native clothing which originated from the northern part of the country) and creams at Ola in Cape Coast, which she has done for seven years. Rosina uses her income to pay for taking care of her children.

Rosina will use the loan to purchase inventory for her business. With the new profits from her expanded business, Rosina plans to invest in her children's education.

loans.use: To purchase more detergents, smocks and creams

loans.name: Pricilla

texts.en: Pricilla I. is 33 years old and she is married with three children. She has a boutique where she sells clothes and shoes. She is requesting a loan of 150,000 nairas to purchase more clothes and shoes to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders!

loans.use: To purchase more clothes and shoes

loans.name: Hope

texts.en: Hope sells provisions to make a living. She is 39 years old and married with four children. She is requesting a loan of 140,000 nairas to purchase more provisions to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders!

loans.use: To purchase more provisions to sell

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es: Elsa tiene 53 años, vive con sus 4 hijos en casa D. sus padres. DesD. hace 8 años se dedica a la venta D. llantas, trabaja durante todo el día en un local comercial que arrendó. Sus hijos la ayudan en atender su establecimiento en sus horarios libres y D. esa manera comparten juntos esta actividad, y D. esa manera se esfuerza por mejorar su negocio, que hasta el momento está yendo muy bien por la buena atención que ofrece y siempre está al tanto D. brindar ofertas a sus clientes. Para más adelante, Elsa no sólo sueña con vender llantas, sino también diversos repuestos para todos los modelos D. los carros. Es la tercera vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, y está con todas las ganas D. seguir esforzándose en el trabajo con su banco comunal. El dinero que requiere lo invertirá en la compra D. más mercadería en llantas.
texts.en:
Elsa is 53-years old and lives with her four children in her parents' house. For 8 years she has worked selling tires; she works all day in a commercial space that she rents. Her children help her attend the store in their free time and in this way the family works together to improve the business, which at the moment is doing well due to good customer service and the good product choices they always proviD. to their customers. In the future, Elsa not only dreams of selling tires but also various spare parts for different car models. This is her third loan with MFP and wants very much to keep working hard with the members of her community bank. The money she needs will be invested in the purchase of tires.

Translated from Spanish by Vivian Lu, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase merchandise

loans.name: Dorah

texts.en: Dorah sells drinks and cola nuts. She is 49 years old and married with six children. She hopes for a loan of 60,000 nairas to purchase more drinks and cola nuts to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders!

loans.use: To purchase more drinks and cola nuts

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en: Mercy is 38 years old and married with five children. She sells provisions. She hopes for the loan amount of N60,000 to purchase more provisions to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more provisions to sell

loans.name: Patience

texts.en: Patience is 45 years old and married with five children. She sells provisions to make a living. She hopes for the loan amount of N50,000 to purchase more provisions to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more provisions to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: Goat and cattle feed

loans.name: Blessing

texts.en: Blessing O. is 25 years old and married with one child. She has a printing machine that she uses to print. She hopes for the loan amount of N50,000 to purchase more printing materials. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more printing materials

loans.name: Nidia Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Nidia del Carmen O., con mucho esfuerzo y un gran espíritu de superación se dedica a su negocio de venta de tortillas elaboradas por ella misma en su propia casa de habitación donde la visitan sus clientes a diario.

Con el fin de mejorar su situación económica y salir adelante en el mantenimiento de su familia, ella ha acudido a Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito para la compra de la materia prima y por este motivo se encuentra muy esperanzada sabiendo que su crédito será otorgado y así comprará el maíz y la leña para la elaboración de las riquísimas tortillas en el municipio de Chichigalpa.
texts.en:
Señora Nidia del Carmen O. works at her business, with much effort and a great desire to overcome all difficulties, selling tortillas which she makes herself in her own home where her customers may find her every day. With the objective of improving her financial situation and moving ahead with providing for her family, she has approached CEPRODEL in order to obtain a loan to purchase the raw materials. And that's why she finds herself very hopeful knowing that her loan request will be approved. Then she will be able to buy corn and firewood in order to prepare the most delicious tortillas in the town of Chichigalpa.

Translated from Spanish by Daniel Kvaka, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Modou

texts.fr: Modou T. est un mareyeur il travaille dans le quai de pêche de Mbour  ville côtière située à 70 km de Dakar. Il évolue dans le secteur de la pêche de plus de deux (2) ans. Chaque jour il achète le poisson des pécheurs pour le revendre aux usines de poissonnerie .Avec les revenus tirés de son activité, il entretien sa femme, ses enfants et ses parents.  A trente quatre (34) ans il n’a jamais eu de prêts. Il sollicite un prêt pour renforcer  et soutenir son activité  pour satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle plus nombreuse.
texts.en:
Modou T. is a fish wholesaler. He works on the fishing pier in the coastal city of Mbour, located 70 km from Dakar. He has been improving in the fish sector for over two years. Each day, he buys fish from fishermen to sell to fish factories. With the revenues derived from his work, he takes care of his wife, children, and parents. He is 34 years old and has never had a loan. He’s requesting a loan to bolster his business in order to satisfy the demands of his bigger customer base.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fish

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es:
Ricardo S. es un caballero originario del municipio de Chichigalpa donde se dedica a su negocio de reparación de bicicletas también dedicándose a la venta de repuestos habiendo adquirido vasta experiencia en este ramo.

El motivo por el cual el señor Ricardo ha acudido hoy en día a Ceprodel es para ser beneficiado con un crédito para la compra de los repuestos para ofertarlos y así continuar adelante en su negocio.
texts.en:
Ricardo S. is a gentleman native to the Chichigalpa municipality, where he has a business repairing bicycles. He also sells spare parts, having acquired vast experience in this industry. The reason Ricardo has come to Ceprodel today is that he hopes to benefit from a loan for the purchase of spare parts to offer in his store, and thus continue to advance his business.

Translated from Spanish by Vivian Lu, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of bicycle spare parts

loans.name: Matida

texts.en: Matida N. is 55 years old and married with six children. She bakes meat pies to sell. She hopes for a loan of 150,000 nairas to purchase more baking materials like flour and baking powder to bake more meat pies to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders!

loans.use: To purchase more baking materials

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es:
En el municipio de Chichigalpa de la ciudad de Chinandega, la señora Rosa D. se dedica a su actividad de venta de queso y aunque no tiene las perfectas condiciones para desarrollar su negocio por encontrarse a la intemperie, busca la manera en como mejorar su negocio para brindar una mejor imagen de su negocio.

La señora Rosa hoy en día requiere de un crédito para la compra del queso y es por esta razón que ella ha acudido a Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito para la compra del queso y de esta forma abastecer su negocio que tanto requiere de pronta inversión para mejorar su condición.
texts.en:
In the Chichigalpa neighborhood of the city of Chinandega, Sra. Rosa Davila operates a business selling cheese. Although conditions for developing the business are not the best, operating as she does in the open air, she looks for ways to improve her business and make it more attractive to her potential customers.

Sra. Rosa needs a loan now so that she can purchase more cheese. That's why she's applied to Ceprodel for a loan which she will use to buy cheese for her business, an investment that she urgently needs in order to improve her condition.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy merchandise for cheese business.

loans.name: Aliou

texts.fr: Aliou D., âgé de trente cinq (35) ans est un mareyeur au quai de pêche de la ville de Mbour. Le quai de Mbour est l’un des quais de pêche le active du sénégalais qui pousse plusieurs jeunes comme  Aliou à quitter leur village pour s’installer au quai pour y travailler comme mareyeur. Il est dans le secteur depuis onze (11) ans, il est bien connu du milieu .les revenus tirés de son activité lui permettent  de nourrir sa famille.il sollicite un prêt pour accroitre son activité.
texts.en:
Aliou D., age 35, is a fish wholesaler at the fishing pier of the city of Mbour. The Mbour pier is one of the most active fishing piers in Senegal that drive many young people, like Aliou, to leave their villages and get situated at the pier to work as fish wholesalers there. He has been in this sector for eleven years and is well-known in the area. The revenues derived from his business enables him to feed his family. He’s requesting a loan to expand his business.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: Christy

texts.en: Christy is 62 years old and married with six children. She sells loaves of bread. She is requesting a loan of 100,000 nairas to purchase more loaves of bread to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders!

loans.use: To purchase more loaves of bread to sell

loans.name: Komi

texts.fr: Komi A. est un jeune homme de 32 ans, marié et père d’un petit garçon. Il est conducteur de taxi moto à Wome, un village situé à environ 130 kilomètres de Lomé, la capitale du Togo. Pour mieux épargner afin de subvenir aux besoins de la famille, Komi souhaite avec ce crédit acquérir sa propre moto. il compte sur cette aubaine pour améliorer les conditions de sa vie
texts.en:
Komi A. is a young man, 32 years old, married, and a father with a young boy. He is a moto taxi driver in Wome, a village located about 130 km from Lomé, the capital of Togo. To save more money for providing for his family, Komi would like to use this loan to acquire his own moto. He is counting on this huge opportunity to improve his living conditions.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a motorbike

loans.name: Xiomara Indiana

texts.es: La señora Xiomara L., reside en el barrio la Luz, tiene 57 años de edad, procreó 6 hijos los cuales son mayores, su esposo vende repuestos de vehículos. Su negocio es la venta de ropa, zapatos y cosméticos, también vende comida ya que esta actividad le genera buenos ingresos. Inició desde hace nueve años con la ayuda de su esposo, con este crédito quiere invertir en la compra de ropa variada ya que tiene unos encargos y desea también desea invertir en su negocio de comida para así ofrecer variedad de paltillos a sus clientes. Sus planes son mejorar el negocio de la comida y espera aumentar las ventas así como la captación de los mismos.
texts.en:
Sra. Xiomara L. lives in the Luz neighborhood. She is 57 years old and has 6 children, all grown. Her husband sells auto parts. Xiomara operates a business selling clothes, shoes and cosmetics. She also sells prepared meals because they generate a good income. She began the business 9 years ago with the help of her husband. With this loan, she wants to purchase some clothes because she has a few orders for them. She also wants to stock up on the supplies that she needs to make the delicious meals that she sells. Her plans are to improve the food business and thereby increase her sales.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy products for resale.

loans.name: Folly

texts.fr: Folly G. est un jeune homme de 29 ans célibataire sans enfants. il est réparateur d’appareils électro-ménagers à Wome. Il exerce ce métier depuis 4 ans. Parallèlement à cette activité, il tient le commerce des pièces détachées. Folly désire avec ce crédit alimenter son magasin afin de mieux satisfaire aux exigences de la clientèle. Ceci lui permettra de gagner plus d’argent pour améliorer ses conditions de vie.
texts.en:
Folly G. is a young man, 29 years old, unmarried, and without children. He is a home appliances repairman in Wome. He has been working at this trade for four years. Concurrently, he does commerce in spare parts. Folly would like to use this loan to supply his store in order to satisfy customer demand better. This will enable him to earn more money to improve his living conditions.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To supply a store

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth I. is 45 years old and married with seven children. She sells dried fish. She hopes for a loan of 100,000 nairas to purchase more dried fish to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders!

loans.use: To purchase more dried fish

loans.name: Thioura

texts.fr: PARENT BENEFICIAIRE DANS LA ZONE DE CAMBERENE PENDANT PLUSIEURS ANNEES THIOURA S. SOLLICITE CE FINANCEMENT POUR S'ADONNER AU PETIT COMMERCE AFIN D'ACCROITRE SES REVENUS ET MIEUX ASSISTER SA PETITE FAMILLE.
texts.en:
As a recipient parent in the CAMBERENE area for several years, Thioura S. is requesting this financing to dedicate all her time to a small business in order to grow her revenues and to do better in helping her small family.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Small-scale commerce

loans.name: Rosina

texts.en: Rosina A. bakes and sells bread in Ola, Cape Coast. Rosina has received senior high school education. She is single and has two children. Rosina has been baking and selling bread for 10 years. She is responsible for taking care of the children. Her loan will be used to buy flour and other bread-making ingredients to increase production. She hopes to use the  profits from her business to build a house.

loans.use: To buy flour and other bread-making ingredients

loans.name: Marieme

texts.fr: Mariéme N. gère un atelier de couture  mais aussi  elle vend des parfums. Son atelier est installé dans sa maison au quartier Grand Mbour situé au bord de la mer à Mbour. Mariéme vit avec son mari et ses enfants dans le domicile conjugal.les  revenus qu’elle tire de son activité lui permettent de participer à la dépense quotidienne  au même titre que son marie. Avec le prêt qu’elle sollicite elle veut acheter des tissus des parfums pour élargir son activité pour affirmer plus son indépendance économique. Elle a cinquante deux  (52) ans et s’occupe de sa famille avec beaucoup de plaisir
texts.en:
Mariéme N. manages a sewing workshop, but she also sells perfumes. Her shop is set up inside her house in the Grand Mbour district located on the seashore in Mbour. She lives with her husband and children in the marital home. The revenues she derives from her work enable her to help cover day-to-day expenses just like her husband does. With this loan she’s requesting, she wants to buy some cloth and perfumes to expand her business in order to affirm further her economic independence. She is 52 years old, and she very happily takes care of her family.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy cloth

loans.name: Ngozi

texts.en: Ngozi A. is 35 years old. She is married and has a child. She sells medicines. She is hoping for a loan of N100,000 to purchase more medicines to sell. She says "thank you" to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more medicines to sell

loans.name: Ameyo

texts.fr: Ameyo A. est une femme de 39 ans, mariée et mère de 3 enfants. Elle est revendeuse de divers articles à Wome. Ameyo exerce ce commerce de 18 mois. Avec ce crédit, A. souhaite accroître la taille de son activité en louant un magasin pour l’exposition de ses marchandises et aussi approvisionner sa boutique de nouveau produits.
texts.en:
Ameyo A. is a young woman, 39 years old, married, and the mother of three. She is a retailer of various goods in Wome. She has been in this business for 18 months. With this loan, she would like to grow her business by leasing a store for showing her merchandise and also to stock her shop with new products.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To lease a store and to stock it

loans.name: Victor

texts.en: Victor I. is 36 years old. He is married and has four children. He sells medicines. He is hoping for a loan of N100,000 to purchase more medicine to sell. He says "thank you" to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more medicine to sell

loans.name: Isaac

texts.es: Isaac tiene 28 años, vive solo en una casa alquilada. Desde hace 4 años se dedica al pintado de carros, se inició trabajando de manera dependiente en otro taller, y ahora tiene su propio negocio, con éxito, pues trabaja con mucho esmero. Ocupa todo el tiempo que sea necesario para cumplir puntualmente lo encomendado, y su labor es bien remunerada, esto lo anima a seguir dedicándose a esta actividad porque le permite sostener sus necesidades diarias, además de tener ahorros. Para más adelante, Isaac quiere ofrecer el servicio de reparación de autos, por ello se está preparando estudiando este oficio. Este es el primer préstamo que tiene con MFP, fue invitado por un amigo a ser parte de su banco comunal, le mostró la forma de trabajar del grupo para crecer en forma solidaria, por lo que Isaac tiene la intención de integrarse a ese ritmo, con mucha responsabilidad de en sus pagos. El dinero que solicita es para la compra de diversos colores de pintura y lijas especiales para la carrocería, ya que tiene varios trabajos pendientes que tiene que cumplir puntualmente.
texts.en:
Isaac, 28, lives alone in a rented house. For 4 years, he's operated a business repainting cars, work that he began doing as an employee of another garage. He now has his own business which is successful because he works with great care. He keeps working for however long he has to so that he can complete the jobs he's charged with on time. He is well paid for his labor, something that encourages him to keep the business going because it allows him to pay for his everyday needs and also save. In the future, Isaac wants to offer auto-repair services and he's preparing to learn how to do it. This is Isaac's first MFP loan. A friend invited him to become a member of his community bank and showed him how the group can help businesses grow. Isaac intends to fall into the rhythm of the group and be responsible about repaying his loan. The money that he's applying for will be use to buy paints of different colors and special polishes for vehicles, supplies that he urgently needs to fill various pending orders.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Supplies for auto-paint business.

loans.name: Jesica

texts.es: Jesica tiene 32 años, vive con sus 3 hijos en casa de sus padres. Desde hace 6 años tiene un restaurante que implementó en su casa, con este negocio obtiene los recursos necesarios para sostener a sus hijos. En la actualidad atiende todos los días, a excepción del domingo, día que usa para descansar y renovar fuerzas. En algunas ocasiones su madre la ayuda en la atención y sus hijos en lo que les sea posible. Jesica ofrece desayunos y almuerzos y debido a la variedad de sus platos y su buena sazón, sus clientes van en aumento, y muchas veces su local es insuficiente para atender a todos los comensales, por lo que está pensando ampliar su restaurante, en su misma casa o arrendando un local más espacioso. Es la tercera vez que tiene un préstamo con MFP, ella es una de las integrantes más responsables de su banco comunal, y siempre promueve la unidad del grupo, aun en momentos difíciles. El dinero que solicita será invertido en la compra de nuevos manteles para sus mesas, además de los víveres e ingredientes necesarios para la preparación de sus platos.
texts.en:
Jesica, 32, and her 3 children live with her parents. For 6 years, she's operated a restaurant that she set up in her house. The business has brought in the resources that she needs to support her children. She opens the restaurant every day but Sunday, a day she uses to rest and renew her strength. Her mother helps her with the business sometimes and her children, too, to the degree that they can. Jesica opens for breakfast and lunch. Because of the variety of dishes on her menu and her skill in the kitchen, her business is growing and she often doesn't have room to seat all who come. That's why she's thinking about expanding her restaurant, either by adding on or renting a larger space somewhere else. This is Jesica's third MFP loan. She is one of the most responsible members of her community bank and always promotes the unity of the group even when it's difficult. The money that she's applying for will be used to buy new tableclothes and supplies that she needs to make her dishes.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Supplies for restaurant business.

loans.name: Isabel Cristina

texts.es: La señora Isabel Cristina Rodríguez, tiene la edad de 43 años, habita en Km. 10 ½ carretera hacia Masaya, junto a su esposo, el cual le apoya con los gastos del hogar, ellos tiene una hija de 12 años, la cual estudia actualmente, los planes hacia su familia es poder mejorar las condiciones de vida, ella desde hace tres años se dedica a confeccionar ropa , ya que tiene que estar al pendiente de su hija ya que la pequeña sufre de epilepsia , los sueños de doña Isabel es poder tener una gran taller de costura . El mayor problema que se le presenta es la falta de financiamiento, ella inicio este negocio con sus propios esfuerzos, con el préstamo lo invertirá en tela, hilo, bordados  y demás accesorios para confecciones, y poder hacer una costura buena y bonita.
texts.en:
Isabel Cristina Rodríguez, 43, lives with her husband at Km. 10 ½ on the highway to Masaya. Her husband helps with the household expenses. They have a twelve year old daughter who currently goes to school. They family plan is to be able to improve their living conditions. For three years she has been making clothes. She has to devote herself to her daughter since the little one suffers from epilepsy. Isabel’s dream is to be able to have a great seamstress shop. The biggest problem she has is the lack of financing. She started this business with her own efforts. With this loan she will buy fabric, thread, embroidery, and other accessories to be able to make good and pretty clothes.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy fabric, thread, embroidery, and other accessories

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en: Mercy I. is 34 years old. She is married and has 4 children. She sells clothes and tailoring materials.She is also a tailor. She is hoping for a loan of N100,000 to purchase more clothes and tailoring materials to sell. She says "thank you" to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more clothes and tailoring materials to sell

loans.name: Marilly

texts.es: Marilly tiene 23 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en la casa de su suegra. Junto a su esposo se dedican al servicio de transporte con una camioneta (combi) que es su principal instrumento de trabajo, trabajan durante todo el día y en esta actividad su esposo es el que conduce la movilidad, mientras Marilly está pendiente del control del tiempo en cada recorrido, y también se da tiempo para atender a sus 2 pequeñas hijas. La ruta que cubren con el servicio de transporte recorre 2 distritos, en una distancia aproximada de 20 kilómetros. Marilly y su esposo tienen grandes deseos de crecer, y uno de sus grandes anhelos a futuro, es adquirir otra camioneta. Este es su primer préstamo con MFP, y se ha comprometido a ser una integrante activa en su banco comunal. El dinero que está solicitando será invertido en la compra de repuestos para el mantenimiento de su movilidad, para que de esa manera tenga menos inconvenientes y no interrumpa su trabajo por un desperfecto imprevisto.
texts.en:
Marilly is 23 years old, and lives with her husband and 2 children in her mother-in-law’s home. Accompanied by her husband, Marilly works in transportation services using a van (combi) that serves as their principal work instrument. They work all day with her husband driving the van while Marilly keeps track of the time during each trip; Marilly also makes sure to set aside time to attend to her 2 small daughters. The route that they cover with their transportation service serves two districts, a distance of approximately 20 kilometers. Marilly and her husband have great hopes of expanding their business, and one of their future wishes is to acquire another van. This is their first loan with MFP, and she has committed herself to being an active member of her communal bank. The money that she has solicited will be invested in the purchase of spare parts for the maintenance of their vehicle so that they face fewer problems that can interrupt their work when unexpected issues arise.

Translated from Spanish by Mariela Cedeno, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase spare parts for her van.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret N. is 30 years old. She is married and has 2 children. She sells medicine to make a living. She is hoping for a loan of N100,000 to purchase more medicine to sell. She says "thank you" to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more medicine to sell

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es: Miriam tiene 23 años, vive con su esposo y su pequeño hijo en una casa  alquilada. Desde hace 4 años se dedica en la atención de su bodega, y a la vez vende comida; su negocio está instalado en su casa, la que se encuentra en una zona muy transitada y comercial de su localidad. Al medio día es cuando tiene mayor cantidad de clientes, es por eso que muchas veces su esposo la ayuda en la atención, pero no es todos los días porque él se dedica a su propio trabajo. Miriam se esfuerza mucho para poder organizar su tiempo, ya que tiene que cocinar la comida que ofrece, atender su tienda, además de llevar y traer a su pequeña hija del jardín de niños. A pesar de este trajín, Miriam está muy contenta con la rentabilidad de su negocio, por lo que no duda en seguir invirtiendo su tiempo y dinero para mejorarlo, tanto en la cantidad de porciones que ofrece al día, como en mejorar la decoración. Este es su tercer préstamo con MFP, y está muy contenta de ser parte de su banco comunal, ya que le permite crecer y pasar tiempo con sus amistades. El dinero que viene solicitando será invertido en la compra de mercadería para su tienda, además adquirirá víveres (sacos de arroz y azúcar) e ingredientes al por mayor para la preparación de sus comidas.
texts.en:
Miriam is 23 years old, and lives with her husband and small child in a rented house. For the past 4 years she has dedicated herself to attending to her small grocery store, while also selling food; her business is out of her home, which is located in a high traffic and commercial area in her neighborhood. Midday is when she has the most clients, and it is because of this that often her husband helps, however, he cannot do this every day because he has his own work. Miriam works hard to organize her time given that she has to cook the food that she offers, attend to her store, and also has to drop off and pick up her small daughter from kindergarten. Despite her hectic day, Miriam is very happy with how profitable her business is, which is why she does not think twice to continue investing her time and money to improving it as much in the quantity of the meals she offers each day as in better decorations. This is her third loan with MFP, and she is very happy to be part of her communal bank because it allows her to grow and spend time with her friends. The money that she requests will be invested in the purchase of merchandise for her store, and she will also acquire supplies (sacks of rice and sugar) and other ingredients wholesale to prepare the meals she sells.

Translated from Spanish by Mariela Cedeno, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase her merchandise.

loans.name: Penda

texts.fr: Penda S. vend des fruits au marché central de la ville de Mbour depuis plus de deux (2) ans. A vingt huit (28) ans elle n’est pas encore mariée. Elle vit avec ses parents dans la maison    familiale. Les revenus tirés de la vente des fruits lui permettent de survenir à ses besoins (se payer des habilles acheter ses effets de toilette ect) pour ne pas dépendre toujours de ses parents. Avec le crédit qu’elle sollicite est veut renforcer son commerce achète plus de fruits pour  répondre à la forte demande.
texts.en:
Penda S. has been selling fruit at the central marketplace of the city of Mbour for two years. She is 28 years old and not yet married. She lives with her parents in the family house. The revenues derived from selling fruit enable her to support herself (to buy clothing, toiletries, etc.) in order not to depend on her parents all the time. With this loan she’s requesting, she wants to bolster her business and to buy more fruit to respond to the strong demand.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fruit

loans.name: Olga

texts.es: Olga tiene 61 años, está separada, vive sola en su casa propia. Desde hace 3 años se dedica a la venta de carne de manera ambulante, ofreciendo su producto a sus vecinos y amistades; y de acuerdo a los pedidos que le hacen compra su mercadería. Es importante para ella asegurarse de que la carne que le vende su proveedor sea de buena calidad y con garantía, porque de eso dependen sus próximas ventas. Cada día, Olga se levanta muy temprano para comprar la carne y llevarla a sus clientes, sabe que su ritmo de trabajo es cansado, sin embargo, disfruta de hacerlo, y piensa en continuar con este negocio mientras tenga fuerzas para ello. Este es su primer préstamo con MFP, y está muy contenta de tener un espacio de amistad donde crece personal y económicamente. El dinero que Olga solicita será invertido en la compra de más carne para abastecer los pedidos para sus clientes.
texts.en:
Olga is 61 years old: she is separated and lives alone in her own house. For the last three years she has sold meat on the street, offering her products to neighbours and friends, in accordance with the the orders they make for her merchandise. It is important for her to be sure that the meat which her provider sells is of guaranteed good quality, because this is what her future sales depend on. Every day, Olga gets up very early in order to buy meat and take it to her customers. She knows that her work routine is tiring, but she enjoys doing it and she thinks that she'll continue in this line of work while she has the strength to do it. This is her first loan from MFP, and she is very happy to have a friendly space where she can grow personally and financially. The money that Olga is asking for will be invested in the purchase of more meat in order to meet her customers' orders.

Translated from Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase stock

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es: Rocío tiene 34 años, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en una casa alquilada. Desde hace 4 años se dedica a la venta de ropa, la cual ofrece de casa en casa, trabajando sólo a pedido. La estrategia de Rocío es captar a personas que tengan un trabajo estable, pues ellos le pueden pagar con puntualidad porque tienen una remuneración regular. Es así, que todas las mañanas, de lunes a viernes, visitas las casas de sus clientes para ofrecer nuevas prendas o para realizar las cobranzas de las que haya dejado al crédito. Según va cobrando, reúne el dinero para comprar nueva mercadería de acuerdo a los nuevos pedidos. Para el futuro, Rocío quiere establecer su negocio y tener una tienda de ropa. Este es su primer préstamo con MFP, los integrantes de su actual banco comunal la invitaron a formar parte de su grupo porque notaron en ella, el coraje de emprender nuevos retos con mucha responsabilidad. Rocío invertirá el dinero que solicita en la compra de más prendas de vestir, y abastecer así, los pedidos de sus clientes, este préstamo es la mitad del monto que necesita, pues la otra mitad será de su mismo capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Rocío is 34 years old: she lives with her husband and their three children in a rented house. For the last 4 years she has sold clothes, which she sells from house to house, only working to order. Rocio's strategy is to target those people who have stable jobs, because they can pay punctually because they have a regular salary. In this way, every morning, from Monday to Friday, she visits the houses of her customers in order to offer them new items or to make collections of those things ordered on credit. Following her collections, she gathers the money to buy new stock in accordance with her new orders. In the future, Rocio wants to establish her business and have a clothes store. This is her first loan with MFP: the members of her community bank invited her to form part of a group because they saw in her the courage to take on new challenges and lots of responsibility. Rocio will invest the money that she has asked for in the purchase of more clothing items, so she can meet her customers' demands. This loan is is half the amount she needs, and the other half will come from her own work captial.

Translated from Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase stock

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es: Tomasa tiene 32 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace 5 años, junto a su esposo, se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado vacuno y ovino, ambos llevan al campo a pastear todo el día a sus animales, pero antes de ello preparan todo lo necesario para su alimentación. En ocasiones salen juntos, pero generalmente se turnan en horas de la mañana para regresar por la tarde. En lo posible buscan pastos frescos y abundantes, para que después de un periodo de alimentación de sus animales los lleven a vender en las principales ferias ganaderas de su localidad, y de esa manera ver los frutos de su ardua labor. Para más adelante, a Tomasa y a su esposo les gustaría tener más animales, y disminuir el tiempo de crianza, para comprar y revender casi de inmediato. Este es su tercer préstamo con MFP, ella desea seguir trabajando con mucho entusiasmo y responsabilidad en sus pagos para que su banco comunal marche bien. El dinero que está solicitando es para la compra de animales al por mayor.
texts.en:
Tomasa is 32 years, and lives with her husband and 2 children in her own house. For the past 5 years, accompanied by her husband, she has dedicated herself to raising bovine and ovine cattle. Tomasa and her husband take their animals to graze in the fields all day, but before they leave they prepare all that is necessary for their own meals. On occasion they go out together, but generally they take turns in the morning hours to be back in the afternoon. Whenever possible they look for fresh and abundant pastures to able to, after a period feeding their animals, take them to the principal cattle markets in their neighborhood and in this way see the fruits of their hard labor. In the future Tomasa and her husband would like to have more animals and diminish the time it takes to raise them to be able to purchase and sell them almost immediately.
