This is her ninth loan with MFP, where she has demonstrated herself as a very responsible client with her repayments, and where at times she has given time working in the labours of the director of her community bank. The money that she is asking for is to buy concentrated food to fatten her pigs, and the rest for the work of a bricklayer who will build the fence of her stable.

Translated from Spanish by Jessica Kaminsky, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy food for Armanda's pigs

loans.name: Celia

texts.es: Celia es una mujer que a sus 54 años de edad sigue teniendo fuerzas para progresar, es soltera, y aunque no tiene hijos, ese espacio lo compensa con el amor que le brinda a su sobrina que cría desde muy niña. Cuando era joven, se dedica a la panadería, actividad muy sacrificada, pero que le dejaba muy buenas ganancias que le permitieron adquirir su casa. Pero debido a dolencias físicas cambio este negocio por la venta de comestibles en una tienda que implementó en su casa. Aunque con forme fueron pasando los años, la competencia fue aumentando, Celia se mantuvo firme con su bodega, negocio que le ha dado muchas satisfacciones, por ello se levanta muy temprano para hacer la limpieza de todos los andamios de su local, y comprar los panecillos calientes para ofrecer a sus clientes. En todos estos años ha ganado mucha experiencia, aprendió a que el trato a sus clientes es muy importante en este negocio, y con ello ha sabido incrementar su clientela regular. Las ganancias que obtiene son para su propio sostenimiento y para cubrir la educación de su sobrina, a quien sostiene como a su propia hija. Este es su noveno crédito con MFP, cabe recalcar que Celia es una de las fundadoras de su banco comunal y en todo este tiempo ha demostrado ser una cliente muy puntual, por ello que es muy respetada por los demás integrantes. Con los 800 soles que solicita comprará mercadería para surtir su negocio y hacer de su bodega una tienda más atractiva.
texts.en:
Celia is a 54 year old woman who has the force to improve her life. She is single and although she doesn’t have children, in this space she compensates with the love she brings to the niece that she has raised since she was very young. When she was a child, she worked at a bakery, a very hard activity, but it gave her a good profit and enabled her to rent her home. But due to physical pain, she changed this business to sell food in a store that she began in her home. Although the years were passing, she improved her skills. Celia maintained herself well in the shop, a business that has given her much satisfaction. For this she gets up very early to do the cleaning of all the scaffolding in her location and to buy the hot breads to offer to her clients. In all these years she has gained much experience, learning that the treatment of her clients is very important in this business, and with this she has been able to increase her regular clients. The earnings that she gets are for her own sustenance, and to cover the education of her niece, whom she supports as her own daughter. This is her ninth loan with MFP. It should be emphasized that Celia is one of the founders of her community bank, and in all this time she has demonstrated herself as a very punctual client. Because of this she is very respected by all the members. With the 800 soles that she is asking for, she would buy merchandise to stock her business and to make her store more attractive.

Translated from Spanish by Jessica Kaminsky, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To stock Celia's Store

loans.name: Edwing

texts.es: Edwing es un joven soltero de 28 años, vive en compañía de sus hermanas en la casa de sus padres, desde muy joven apoya en los trabajos agrícolas a sus progenitores, puesto que es el único varón. Cuando cumplió 18 años, se dio cuenta que el dinero en su casa era insuficiente, por ello decidió sembrar en chacras alquiladas, cultivando mayormente zanahorias y espinacas, y en esta actividad lleva cerca de los 8 años. Desde entonces ha ido incrementando sus cultivos, y su anhelo es de sembrar muchas hectáreas de zanahorias, espinacas y lechugas, para que en los  años próximos se convierta en un proveedor importante del mercado de la ciudad de Tarma. A Edwing le gusta su trabajo, puesto que gracias a este, recauda el dinero para cubrir sus necesidades urgentes, y aunque a veces ha visto truncarse sus sembríos por la falta de dinero para los fertilizantes, no desmaya en su esfuerzo. En estos años ha ganado la experiencia suficiente para saber cómo prevenir y curar sus plantas ante el acecho de las diversas plagas, por ello que siempre está en constante observación de sus cultivos. Este es su 9no préstamo con MFP, y ha sido muy puntual en cada una de sus cuotas, con este crédito hace compromisos de seguir pagando responsablemente, asimismo su cargo como secretario de su banco comunal lo cumple eficientemente, por lo que todos los integrantes lo estiman mucho. Edwin ha decidido invertir los 1500 soles que solicita para el abonado de sus chacras de hortalizas, para de ese modo llevar productos de primera calidad al mercado de Tarma.
texts.en:
Edwing is a young bachelor of 28 years. He lives in the company of his sisters in the home of his parents. From a very young age he has helped with the agricultural work of his family, since he is the only boy. When he turned 18, he realised that the money in the home was insufficient. Because of this he decided to sow in rented fields, growing more carrots and spinach, and in this activity he has spent about 8 years. Since then he has increased his cultivation, and his greatest wish is to grow more hectares of carrots, spinach, and lettuce, so that in the coming years she can convert himself into an important merchant in the market of the city of Tarma. Edwing likes his work, as he is grateful to it for providing the money to cover urgent needs, and although sometimes he has seen his harvests shortened for the lack of money for fertilizer, he has not diminished his efforts. In recent years he has gained sufficient experience to know what is coming and to raise his plants through the threats of various pests. Because of this he is always observing his fields. This is his ninth loan with MFP, and he has been very punctual in each one of his repayments. With this loan he has a commitment to continue paying responsibly, as his role of the secretary of the community bank shows effectively, because all the members think highly of him. Edwin has decided to invest the 1500 soles that he is asking for to fertilize his fields of vegetables, and in this manner to continue producing the best quality of the Tarma market.

Translated from Spanish by Jessica Kaminsky, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Epifania

texts.es: Epifanía tiene 56 años, es madre soltera, mujer luchadora y responsable, vive en su casa propia junto a sus 3 hijos, que son el motivo de su trabajo diario en aras de mejorar su calidad de vida. Los cultivos agrícolas y la comercialización de hierbas aromáticas son las actividades que viene desarrollando hace varios años en las ferias de su pueblo Palcamayo. Gracias a estas actividades ha conseguido el dinero para educar a sus hijos. Para ello se levanta a las 4.00am para realizar todos sus quehaceres y luego dedicarse a sus cultivos, los cuales cuida con mucho esmero y cariño. El tiempo le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para realizar un buen trabajo con sus plantas, las que constantemente le dan muy buenos productos para su comercialización. Para más adelante, Epifania espera incrementar sus cultivos y con la ayuda de sus hijos convertirse en una prospera comerciante en el mercado de la ciudad de Tarma. Este es su 3er préstamo con MFP, y está muy contenta por la forma de trabajo y la solidaridad de los integrantes de su banco comunal. Con los 1500 soles que solicita comprará abonos sintéticos para sus cultivos de hortalizas.
texts.en:
Epifanía is 56 years old. She is a single mother, a determined and responsible woman. She lives in her own home with her three children, who are the motive of her daily ploughing work, to improve the quality of life. The agricultural fields and the sale of aromatic herbs are the activities that she has done for many years, in the markets of her town Palcamayo. Thanks to these activities, she has found the money to educate her children. For them she rises at 4AM to do the chores and later to work in her fields, which she tends with much care and tenderness. The time that she has spent gives her the needed experience to do a good job with the plants, which are continually productive for her sales. In the future, Epifanía hopes to increase her cultivation and with the help of her children convert herself into a prosperous merchant in the market of the city of Tarma. This is her third loan with MFP, and she is very happy with how it works and with the solidarity of the members of her community bank. With the 1500 soles that she is asking for, she would buy synthetic fertilisers for her vegetable fields.

Translated from Spanish by Jessica Kaminsky, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.es: Ernestina tiene 50 años, vive con su pareja, con la que tiene 4 hijos, ella es una madre muy trabajadora y abnegada con su negocio, vive en su casa propia junto a sus hijos, que son el motivo de su esfuerzo que desea darles buenos estudios. La siembra y venta de espinaca es la actividad que realiza diariamente en sus chacras, las cuales cultiva y riega con mucho esmero para que crezcan y broten muy buenos frutos. Por ello, todos los días se levanta muy temprano para preparar los alimentos, y más aún en los meses de cosecha, que tiene que alistar las canastas donde serán embarcadas las espinacas adecuadamente para que no sufran alteraciones hasta llegar al mercado de Tarma.  Los años que llevan en esta actividad le han dado la experiencia para el manejo de sus siembras y venta de hortalizas, y lo que más le gusta es la cosecha, porque avizora la cantidad de dinero que captará con ella, por otro lado, lo más difícil de su trabajo es cargar las canastas pesadas a los camiones con sumo cuidado para que no se maltraten, y fue con estas canastas con las que ha preferido tomarse la foto. Este es su 4to crédito con MFP, sus compañeros del banco comunal ya están en el 9no préstamo debido a que ella se incorporó en el 5to ciclo del grupo, y está muy contenta con el trabajo organizado de los integrantes. El dinero que solicita es para renovar sus canastas, y para la compra de fertilizantes químicos para el abonado de sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Ernestina is 50 years old and lives with her husband and their 4 children. She is a very hard-working mother and devotes herself to her business. She lives in her own home with her children and is motivated by her wish to give them a good education.
She makes a living growing and selling spinach. Every day she tends and waters her plots with great care so that they grow and produce very good fruit. She gets up very early every day to prepare food and even earlier during the harvest months, when she has to prepare the baskets that carry the spinach safely to the Tarma market.
Her years in this work have given her the necessary experience to manage her crops and sell her produce. The harvest is what she most likes about her work because she looks forward to the amount of money she will gain. On the other hand, the most difficult part of her work is carrying the heavy baskets to the trucks undamaged; it is with these baskets that she has chosen to take her photo.
This will be her 4th loan with MFP. Her fellow members at the communal bank are already on their 9th loan since she joined in on the group’s 5th loan cycle; she is very happy with the members’ organized work. She is requesting the money to repair her baskets and to purchase chemical fertilisers for her crops.

Translated from Spanish by Carolyn McCaffrey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase fertilisers and baskets to transport her produce

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel tiene 32 años, es una madre alegre y dinámica en cada uno de sus trabajos, vive con su pareja y padre de sus hijos en su casa propia. Fue campesina desde niña, por ello que le tiene un gran cariño a cada uno de sus cultivos, los cuales orgullosamente muestra, y para la foto sostiene los bulbitos secos de la flor llamada gladiolo. Generalmente se dedica al cultivo de flores porque le generan mayores ingresos, con el apoyo de su esposo trabaja muy duro diariamente para lograr cosechar en grandes cantidad y de buen tamaño para que tenga un mejor precio en el mercado. Sus labores en el campo son muy duras y pesadas; pero ello no le ha quitado la alegría, y siempre tiene una sonrisa que brindar. Para el futuro, Maribel se proyecta a sembrar en mayores cantidades, aunque su dificultad mayor es el costo elevado de los fertilizantes, ya que sin ellos sus productos no se desarrollan bien. Este es su 4to préstamo con MFP, sus compañeros del banco comunal ya están en el 5to crédito debido a que ella se incorporó en el 2do ciclo de este grupo y está muy contenta con el trabajo organizado de todos. El dinero que solicita es para la compra de fertilizantes químicos, y de ese modo abonar la chacra de papas y de flores que sembrará en el transcurso de estos días.
texts.en:
Maribel is 32 years old, and is a mother who approaches all of her work happily and dynamically. She lives with her husband and children in their own house. She has been a farmer since she was a child, and that is why she is very fond of all of her crops, which she proudly shows; in the photo she is holding the dried bulbs of the gladiolus flower. Maribel generally makes a living growing flowers, since they generate the most income. With her husband’s help she works very hard each day looking after their great quantity of large-sized crops, which will fetch a better price at the market. Her work in the field is very hard and tiring, but it continues to be enjoyable, and she always has a smile when she works. In the future Maribel is planning to plant larger amounts of crops, though the biggest problem is the high cost of fertilizer, since without it her crops will not grow well. This is her 4th loan with Kiva partner MFP, though her colleagues at the communal bank are already in their 5th loan cycle because she joined the group during its 2nd loan cycle; she is very pleased with everyone’s work. The money that Maribel is requesting is for purchasing chemical fertilizer. She will use it to fertilize the field where she grows potatoes and flowers, which she will plant in the coming days.

Translated from Spanish by Christopher Knutson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing fertilizer

loans.name: Oswaldo

texts.es: Oswaldo es un padre de familia de 28 años, vive con su pareja y madre de su hija en la casa que construyeron hace poco a base de mucho esfuerzo, por el bienestar a su pequeña hija Mayra de 4 añitos de edad. Cuando cumplió 18 años se propuso sembrar sus propios cultivos de papas y hortalizas en chacras alquiladas, por las cuales paga anualmente la suma de 100 soles a más, dependiendo si el terreno es temporal o de regadío. Pese a sus falencias y a no contar con terrenos propios, nunca ha dejado de sembrar; pero para incrementar sus ingresos, desde hace 3 meses viene trabajando como chofer en el carro de su hermano ganando 20 soles diarios, dinero que le sirve para mantener a su familia mientras espera la cosecha, pero una vez iniciada ésta, retomará sus  labores agrícolas hasta terminar de comercializar sus productos en los mercados de la ciudad de Tarma, con cuyas ganancias podrá acumular mayores ingresos para realizar nuevas siembras. Este es su 5to préstamo con MFP, y durantes estos ciclos ha demostrado ser un cliente que paga puntualmente cada una de sus cuotas programadas, y para este crédito reitera su promesa de realizar los pagos en las fechas señaladas de su banco comunal. El dinero que solicita es para mandar a barbechar (mover y hacer surcos) con yuntas sus chacras temporales, y con otra parte comprará insecticidas para su chacra de alverjas.
texts.en:
Oswaldo is a father, is 28 years old, and lives with his partner, the mother of his daughter, in the house they recently built with much effort, for the well being of his small daughter Mayra who is 4 years old. When he was 18 he began to plant his own fields of potatoes and vegetables in rented plots, for which he pays annually the sum of 100 soles or more, depending on whether the land is seasonal or irrigated. In spite of his difficulties and of not having his own fields, he has never stopped planting, but to increase his income he has been working for the last three months as a driver using his brother's car and earning 20 soles daily, money that helps him maintain his family while he awaits the harvest. Once the harvest begins, he will return to his agricultural labors until he finishes the commercialization of his products in the markets of the city of Tarma. With these earnings he will be able to accumulate greater income for new plantings. This is his fifth loan with MFP and during these cycles he has demonstrated that he is a client who repays punctually each of the scheduled payments and for this loan he reiterates his promise to make the payments on the dates set out by his community bank. The money that he requests is to have his seasonal fields plowed and furrowed with oxen. With the other part he will buy insecticide for his fields of peas,

Translated from Spanish by Daniel Burke, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Prepare his fields for planting and buy insecticide.

loans.name: Sixto

texts.es: Sixto tiene 56 años, es un hombre muy responsable y trabajador, vive en su casa propia con su pareja, con quien tuvo 6 hijos, y por quienes trabaja duro para darles educación, por lo que todos ellos migraron a diversas ciudades a estudiar. La agricultura y la albañilería son las actividades que realiza diariamente de forma alternada, las veces que le solicitan sus servicios de albañil trabaja de 7 a 10 días corridos en la obra, y el resto de días a sus cultivos de hortalizas, donde mayormente siembra zanahorias y espinacas. Para ello se levanta muy temprano para trabajar en sus tierras, y a eso de las 8.00am regresa a su casa a desayunar, en seguida regresa en compañía de su esposa a seguir trabajando en sus sembríos, puesto que gracias a la agricultura puede brindarles educación y comodidades a sus hijos. Los años le han permitido tener la experiencia para ser un buen agricultor, puesto que esos conocimientos los emplea a diario en sus labores para velar por el buen desarrollo de cada una de sus plantas. Sixto espera incrementar sus sembrios en chacras alquiladas, donde, con la ayuda de su bicicleta, transporta fácilmente todos sus cultivos.  Sixto es un cliente muy responsable y el primero en pagar las cuotas mensuales, asimismo apoya en comunicar a los demás integrantes de haber una reunión extraordinaria de su banco comunal, este es su 9no crédito con MFP, y es muy respetado por los demás integrantes por la responsabilidad mostrada. Con los 1500 soles solicitados comprará fertilizantes químicos para el abonado de sus chacras de hortalizas.
texts.en:
Sixto is 56 years old and he is a very responsible and hardworking man. He lives in his own house with his common-law wife, with whom he had 6 children. He has worked hard to give them all an education and they have all gone to different cities to study. He works in agriculture and masonry. When his masonry services are solicited, he works 7 to 10 days straight in the job, and the rest of the time he grows vegetables, mostly carrots and spinach. He gets up very early to work his land and returns to the house at 8:00am to eat breakfast. He then returns to the fields, in the company of his wife, to continue working with his crops. It is thanks to agriculture that he is able to provide for the education and needs of his children. The years have granted him the experience that he needs to be a good farmer. He uses this knowledge everyday to work toward the healthy growth of each one of his plants. Sixto hopes to increase his crops in rented plots, from which, with the help of his bicycle, he easily transports all of his crops. Sixto is a very responsible client and the first to make his monthly payments. He also helps out by informing the other members if there is an unscheduled meeting of their communal bank. This is his 9th loan with MFP and he is very respected by the other members because of the responsibility he has demonstrated. With the requested 1500 PEN, he will buy chemical fertilizers for his vegetable plots.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fertilizers

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es: Gladys tiene 40 años, vive con su esposo y sus hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace 3 años se dedica a la venta de harinas de diversos productos; como el maíz, trigo y cebada, los cuales cultiva ella misma y muele en sus propios molinos; también compra al por mayor algunas menestras, las muele y vende en harina. Para esta actividad cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, quien es su mano derecha. Adicionalmente, siembran otro tipo de productos agrícolas, y al llegar la época de cosecha, dedican más tiempo a sus cultivos, que luego venden en los mercados de su localidad. Hasta el momento, estas actividades le han generado buenos ingresos y les va muy bien. Por ello, el deseo de Gladys y de su esposo es de incrementar su producción y mejorar las máquinas de molino que poseen. Este es su quinto préstamo con MFP, ella está muy contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal y en todo este tiempo ha impulsado el trabajo en equipo del grupo. Gladys está solicitando un préstamo que le servirá en la compra de otra máquina moledora de granos porque la que tiene ya no funciona bien.
texts.en:
Gladys is 40 years old and lives with her husband and her children in their own home. For three years she has been selling various types of flour such as corn, wheat and barley, of which she cultivates herself and grinds in her own mills. She also purchases some legume, grinds them, and sells in flour form. For that task she counts on the support of her husband, who is her right hand. Additionally, they sow other types of agricultural products and when harvest season arrives, they dedicate more time to their crops, which they later sell in their local markets. Up to now, these activities have generated a good income and business is going well. For these reasons, Gladys and her husband wish to increase their production and improve their mill machines. This is her fifth loan with MFP and she is very happy to belong to her communal bank, for during all this time, business has advanced for everyone in the group. Gladys is requesting a loan that will go toward the purchase of another mill machine that grinds grains because the one that she has does not work well.

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia Cortina, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of a mill machine

loans.name: Felipa Eufemia

texts.es:
En el Mercado Mayoreo de la ciudad de Managua, la señora Felipa R. se dedica a su actividad de venta de carbón el cual comercializa con mucho entusiasmo en su propio tramo donde atiende a sus clientes.

Ella se ha caracterizado por ser una persona muy trabajadora especialmente porque dedica mucho tiempo a su labor iniciando todos los días desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana. Hoy en día ella ha solicitado un crédito en Ceprodel para la compra del carbón y así salir adelante en su negocio en el mercado.
texts.en:
Mrs. Felipa Rodriguez sells charcoal in Mayoreo Market in the city of Managua, where, in her own section, she tends to her clients with much enthusiasm. She characterizes herself as a very hard-working person, especially because she dedicates a lot of time to her job, starting each day at very early hours. Currently, she is requesting a loan in Ceprodel for the purchase of charcoal and thus advance her business in the market.

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia Cortina, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of charcoal

loans.name: María Fátima

texts.es:
En el Mercado Mayoreo de la ciudad de Managua, la señora María Fátima Q. se dedica a su actividad de venta de frutas en su propio tramo que ha logrado establecer a raíz de sus múltiples esfuerzos.

Es de importancia destacar que ella es una persona muy trabajadora que ha logrado salir adelante en sus ventas teniendo un gran deseo de superar aún más y para ello ha acudido a Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de las frutas y de esta manera continuar ofertándolas para así bendecir a su familia que debe de mantener.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria Fatima Q. sells fruits in her own section of the Mayoreo Market in the city of Managua, which she has managed to establish through multiple efforts. It is important to note that she is a very hard-working person that has been able to advance in her business by having a strong desire to continually succeed, which is why she has turned to Ceprodel to request a loan for the purchase of fruits. With this loan, she plans to continue selling fruits in order to support her family.

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia Cortina, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of fruit

loans.name: Faustina Del Socorro

texts.es:
La señora Faustina M. es originaria de la ciudad de Managua donde se dedica a su negocio de venta de alimentos los cuales son preparados por ella misma con el propósito de mantener su hogar ya que con este ingreso  percibido mantiene a su familia.

Hoy en día ha acudido a Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de la materia prima para elaborar los alimento y así salir adelante en el negocio.
texts.en:
Mrs. Faustina M. is originally from the city of Managua where she manages a business selling home-made food which she prepares herself for the purpose of supporting her home and family, as this represents her main form of income. Currently she has turned to Ceprodel to request a loan for the purchase of raw materials to create her meals and advance in her business.

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia Cortina, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of raw materials

loans.name: María Teodora

texts.es:
En el Mercado Mayoreo de la ciudad de Managua la señora María Teodora T. desde hace varios años se dedica a la venta de plátanos siendo comercializados todos los días por ella misma con el propósito de mantener su núcleo familiar.

El motive por el cual solicita un crédito es para la compra de los perecederos como lo son los plátanos por lo que espera muy confiadamente en que Ceprodel le brindará dicho crédito y así adquirirá su producto para mejorar su condición.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria Teodora Torres has been personally selling bananas for several years at the Mayoreo Market in the city of Managua with the purpose of supporting her family. The reason she requests a loan is for the purchase of perishables like bananas, of which she strongly hopes that Ceprodel will grant her so that she may acquire her product and improve her situation.

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia Cortina, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of bananas

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es:
La venta de verduras es un negocio que requiere de mucha inversión porque los productos son perecederos y por tal razón se debe de estar rotando el almacén de dichos productos. 

En el Mercado Mayoreo de la ciudad de Managua la señora Karla H. se dedica a su negocio de venta de verduras ubicándose en un establecimiento propio donde a diario vende sus productos a sus clientes.
Ha llegado a Ceprodel con el propósito de ser beneficiada con un crédito para comprar las verduras y así continuar ofreciéndolas en su negocio en el mercado Mayoreo en Managua.
texts.en:
Vegetable sales is a business that requires a lot of investment because the products are perishable. For this reason, one must rotate the inventory of products. In the Wholesale Market in the city of Managua, Karla Hernandez sells vegetables to customers everyday from her own stall. She has come to Ceprodel with the goal of obtaining a loan to buy vegetables so that she can continue offering them at her business in Managua’s Wholesale Market.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy vegetables

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.es:
La señora Rosalina I. se dedica a laborar en el Mercado Mayoreo en Managua teniendo su propia pulpería donde ofrece los productos comestibles tales como arroz, frijoles, aceite, huevos, refrescos, entre otros.

Su negocio ha logrado salir adelante porque ella ha invertido grandemente en este. Hoy en día la razón única por la que espera en Ceprodel es para ser beneficiada con el crédito oportuno para la compra de los productos de pulpería y así salir adelante en el negocio que ella posee.
texts.en:
Rosalina I. makes a living working in the Mayoreo Market in Managua. She has her own convenience store where she offers food products such as rice, beans, oil, eggs and soft drinks, among other items. Her business has helped her succeed because she has invested heavily into it. Today the only reason she turns to Kiva partner Ceprodel is to benefit from a loan by purchasing grocery products and thus continue making headway with her business.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase grocery products
